overview:
Matt Ehrlichman is the Chief Strategy Officer at Active Network. Ehrlichman leads the company’s technology business units and is responsible for establishing Active Network as the leader in each of its markets. In addition, Ehrlichman is responsible for the company’s technology growth and earnings goals, marketing operations, business development, international operations, and mergers and acquisitions.

Ehrlichman joined Active Network in the start of 2007, and helped to grow the companyâ€™s revenues from $65 million in 2006 to $245 million in 2009. Prior to joining the company, Ehrlichman was co-founder and chief executive officer of Thriva, which was acquired by the Active Network in March 2007.

Ehrlichman attended Stanford University where he received both his Bachelor of Science degree in entrepreneurial engineering and Master of Science degree in management science and engineering.
